name: Hercules (itch)
description:
Hercules, the game

I created this game working alone for a year. It tells the tale of Hercules, the Ancient Greek mythological hero, focusing on his famous 12 labours.

This is the first public BETA version 0.1   .  There are 13 main quests, more than 10 side quests.

In this game you can: fight monsters, read books, harvest and loot items, interact with all NPCs, explore dungeons, complete knowledge quizzes and more. 

Over 4 hours of gameplay.

Controls,  PC

Movement > Arrows

Talk, examine, select, yes > Spacebar or Enter

Back, cancel, no > ESC

ESC, game menu > ESC

Controls (controller)

OST
